website_summaries.verdict: A great pick if quick setup and wide angle is important to you.
pros: Fast setup and app integration make it easy to use
Wide viewing angle, remote control, and snapshot feature are useful
cons: Night vision is not as clear as other models

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT. DO IT. INCREDIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised with the functionality, haven’t found anything wrong with it yet. Works great, moves relatively well. Better quality than expected and functions in real time; feedback to the app is almost instantaneous. Night vision works exceptionally well. Bang bang for your buck! 4.8987/5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE TIME !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quite the pain to set up, BUT it was definitely worth it. For this price, you have two way audio, pretty decent quality, and can control the view of the camera. Love it. Would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for our baby cam.
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera up & running today. So far i am impressed with the video resolution over the older,480p IP cameras that i have.The camera movement looks pretty responsive and the movement/video/audio lag seems to be minimal. I haven't tried out the more advanced features yet, such as recording to SD or anything since this will serve as a baby crib monitor. I did try out the 2-way audio & it seems to work fine as well. All in all i am satisfied with this camera, especially for the price,and will most likely grab another one for our our next baby.
customer_reviews.author: Girven Garry

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to spy on my dog I just adopted. Works great, camera is decent quality. If I wanted to be really nitpicky, it sometimes is a little slow to respond and the movement swipes in the app take a while to move your view around. Very easy to set up. It also makes an audible noise when moving around and also clicks when going from normal to infrared.... Which I found out my dog can hear and then proceeds to bark furiously at (which is no fault of the camera, see attached screenshot
customer_reviews.author: R. Cottrill

customer_reviews.title: Constantly rebooting
customer_reviews.text: Constantly looses connection. I have to reboot the camera every time I go to view it.
customer_reviews.author: TAYLOR FENNER

customer_reviews.title: Roommates entering your room without permission!!
customer_reviews.text: Tired of my roommates entering in my bedroom taking my staffs without permission!! This camera fixed my problems! Easy way to install just download the app iMegaCam and follow the steps to set up the IP camera on page 5 (Quick start guide). I set the ip camera via wireless connection make sure your device is connecting to 2.4 G wifi signal otherwise will be imposible to connecting to the wifi and remember the "UID" and "Password" will be locating on the bottom of the ip camera. Important "TIP" while you are connecting the camera make sure to move your cell phone closer to camera and turn up the volumen to get a better and faster connection.
customer_reviews.author: Edwing

customer_reviews.title: Not so new!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these cameras already. My mom has been falling and these help me to keep an eye on her and communicate if she can't get to the phone. This is package showed up used. The box was visibly opened and there was a gook on the actual camera. I was going to return but it was needed. I do think that is it's BS due to the fact I paid for a new item not the used ones that they offer for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: ToniO

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while before writing this review to get some good use out of it first. The camera has exceeded my expectations in picture qualit. The camera was quick and easy to set up over my wifi, and i didn't have any problems scanning the QR code that other have had. The app is pretty good. It has all of the basic functions on it (eg controlling camera movement, turning on the speaker or microphone).I'm away frequently at work and i'm still able to check on my toddler via wifi or data without any lag. I'm even able to talk to her through the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: No idea how to set it up
customer_reviews.text: This came with no instructions. It doesn't specify what app to download and there are no instructions in the app that I thought was the right one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Works great. I love being able to talk through the camera and communicate it's nice for talking to kids or pets. You can also move the camera through the app which is great and it comes with a mount so you can put it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the 720P version of this exact item for well over a year to watch the dog while at work and the cat while out of town. It's been amazingly good for the price, so when we decided to get a second one, I went for the same thing. Then saw this one, which has an even better picture. The cameras are great, picture quality amazing, surprisingly crisp night vision, and the app is very easy to set up and use. It's a great product I would have expected to have to pay much more for. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera to use as a baby monitor, more to watch the older kids play in the playroom well I am cooking. Well, we love it! We have tried It with the baby and playroom. It hooks up to our WiFi and we will be ordering more!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tator256

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, pretty neat
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had a security camera before. I bought solely to watch on my dog while at work. For the price, this thing does exactly what I wanted. Pictures pretty good, sound is good enough. Can pan the camera using the phone App. Sometimes it feels a little laggy when swiping to move the camera, but nothing major. Set up took barley 2 minutes. It’s a pretty neat. It is plugged in thru an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: jN

customer_reviews.title: Works great as pet cam or security cam
customer_reviews.text: Simple enough to use , easy instruction . Put the app on phone and check from where ever . You can put micro sd card and it will record every time alert is triggered. I posted pic of night vision to show what it looks like . That’s approx 25 fat away. Inexpensive and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hua

customer_reviews.title: Setup is difficult
customer_reviews.text: The setup for this camera is a pain: 1) you have to change your WiFi networks to 2.4Mhz which I never really figured out how to do 2) the camera won’t take passwords that have special characters ($&@, etc). So I spent a lot of tine trying to figure these two things out and it was such a pain I just decided to return this. Also, never figured how to install the SD card to record. The instructions and the app have a lot of typos—- didn’t feel to safe about that. I don’t recommend this camera at all because it was not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMeHere

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is such a POS! Not only is it very slow capturing pictures but it also DOES NOT alert me when someone is in my home. It doesn't self record any movement either. It's absolutely useless!
customer_reviews.author: CI

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work as a baby monitor - audio goes silent sometimes!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work for someone who wants to use as a baby monitor! I thought it was working okay for the first couple weeks. But recently I've noticed that the app or camera stops producing the white noise sound that is always there. Just silence. This tells me that it's cutting out and losing sound sometimes which is NOT acceptable for someone who needs to hear their baby cry. I wish I could return it. So unhappy with the product and now back to square one for us.
customer_reviews.author: 1pelameriya

customer_reviews.title: Nice home camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a almost a year so far. It’s in my living room. Just like the description, it works fine for all I need. I can even talk to people at home through the camera, it just has a little delay due to the network connection. Overall, I highly recommended it if you are just looking for something to watch your pet or kids.
customer_reviews.author: Taliah Waajid

customer_reviews.title: Works fine... When it works... Which is not often.
customer_reviews.text: The picture and audio quality of this camera are fine. The range and focus are decent. The setup isn't challenging and didn't take much time. The price was right. My issue with this camera is that, despite trying numerous apps and several phones, the camera rarely connects so it can actually be used. 9 out of 10 times, it has to be rebooted (which takes 1-3 minutes), and even then, it typically disconnects after a minute. We use this for a baby monitor and if our child is crying we want to know instantly what the problem is. Having to wrestle with a disfunctional camera is not what we want to be spending that time doing.
customer_reviews.author: Profplaydoe

customer_reviews.title: Useless & Does not connect
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded the app, went through the process of adding the camera multiple times, troubleshooted, followed multiple suggestions I found in reviews to properly connect the camera... double, triple, infinitely checked my settings, volume, permissions & wifi capabilities... and the camera WOULD NOT CONNECT. I tried it all. Nothing worked. It will simply not connect, even when all components (phone, wifi, camera) are touching each other. It does not connect wirelessly OR via an ethernet cable. Useless. Maybe the individual camera I recieved is busted... it's garbage & I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work when you’re not home.
customer_reviews.text: Would work great if used as a baby monitor, however when I’m not home, I can’t see my senior dog. It says the camera is always disconnected or offline. I was looking forward to using it because of the features, but sadly will be returning it. I’m not tech savvy enough to figure out how to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: MooMoo

customer_reviews.title: spotty connection.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the problem is with the app or the camera itself, but it is constantly restarting (returning the camera to the default position). Event recording doesn't seem to catch anything, but if its pointing at the ceiling instead of at my dogs kennel it's not going to see any movement. Occasionally after a few restarts I can get the live view to work. and when it does work it is great, it would probably be 4 stars in that case. Also the problems didn't seem to start right away. Out of the box the camera worked just fine, and over time started being able to connect less and less.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-wasted money
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this camera it was easy to set up and use. I was a fan. I’m on a second replacement camera as of November 2018 and the picture quality changes from good to bad, frame is condensed and can’t fix right away, tint changes to purple and can’t be fixed right away, I purchased the chip to save video and pictures and it isn’t recognized no matter how many times I reboot and the connection is horrible whether in or out of WIFI range. I’ve missed so much feed thankfully no emergencies were missed with my dog.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE DAMICO

customer_reviews.title: NOT an IP camera
customer_reviews.text: Unlike what the Amazon listing says, this is NOT an IP camera! It requires the mobile phone App to setup, control, and view the live stream. It is however very easy to set up and use, in both wired and wireless modes! But if you are planning to use it to view the video from your computer (i.e web browser) or in conjunction with your Vera setup, it will not work. I tried very hard and even reached out to TENNVIS support, who was super responsive, but you can't communicate with the camera using the standard IP protocol... Thank you Amazon for your fantastic return policy!
customer_reviews.author: Abasourdix

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few days only
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few days and then suddenly cannot connect. We even upgraded internet since purchase, hoping that could’ve been the issue. We’ve uninstalled the app and re-installed. Still does not work! So frustrated. I’m not tech savvy so when I purchased this, my husband was deployed and a knowledgeable teenage boy set it up. When it stopped working shortly after, the teen couldn’t figure it out, so I waited and hoped husband could when he returned. I should’ve returned it instead because he couldn’t get it to work either.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: picture feed to phone is constantly freezing/buffering
customer_reviews.text: i just got it and the set up is pretty confusing but the real issue so far is the buffering of video i have unit wired via ethenet and wireless router all equipment is within 5 ft. of each other yet video stream to phone is approx. 1 image still per minute also no camera movement and no audio i have been on settings page for these issues i don't want to condemn it yet and i still will try to make more adjustments but i;m going out on a limb and anticipate returning this. u don't always get what u pay for sometimes u get less
customer_reviews.author: farmerizzy

customer_reviews.title: Current Model will NOT allow PC viewing - beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera specifically to use for PC viewing and spent several hours trying to figure out what was wrong and why the IP address wasn't being seen on the network. Wrote to Tenvis and, to their credit, they responded in less than 12 hours to inform me that the latest 2019 model no longer supports PC to IP viewing and I should feel good about using the iPhone App. uhm, no. Need the PC for a very specific use case so will be returning it and trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wise to read prior to your purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! Loved everything about this camera initially yet 2 weeks into it began malfunctioning and I’ve spent hrs and days trying to troubleshoot with not much help online from Tenvis. Now I’m stuck w a product that performed for the 1st couple weeks. Now isn’t yet NO refund or return. :’( Just a heads up for others here considering the purchase. Please rethink & trust me on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup and with a good view
customer_reviews.text: I was have a few of wireless camera before, never had one like this. First it had a clear instructions to show you step by step setup. It took me only 5 minutes, yes it’s 5 minutes. I had a view at my phone already. The only thing you need is WiFi and connect the camera with power. That’s it. Secondly this camera very light weight, you won’t worry to hang on wall, the last thing is it can record, wow that’s what I need, planning to had two more for my business, good thing is as long as you got power adapter. No Wire at all. I’m very satisfied my purchase will recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: PeggieHsu

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up but doesn't work as it should
customer_reviews.text: Revised Review after using for a while: The camera has to be rebooted almost every day because it stops working and sometimes I have to unplug it and plug it back in to get it to start working again; so, it has proofed to be pretty useless. Original Review: I set this up to monitor my cats and it works great. It was really easy to set up. Just download the app onto your phone - the camera was picked up by the phone without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not good for customization
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is nice, it's simple and can be connected to your network via the App. But that's it... In making this more dumbed down for the standard user, it did away with any ability to access and configure the camera on the back-end of things. So if you have a more secure network or want to utilize browser viewing, you cannot. You can only view this through the App and there are no other options within to tinker with the cam.
customer_reviews.author: Law

customer_reviews.title: Great wifi camera at a great price! Definitely a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wifi camera. I was a little overwhelmed by all those big-name camera companies that cost over $100 and appeared to deliver the same quality product as this one. I went ahead and ordered this wifi cam. Not only were the quality of the images great, but also the connectivity of this camera was beyond compare! I have my wifi router in my living room and placed the camera in my front porch. The quality of the signal is great and there is literally no lag between what's happening in front of the camera and what I see in my phone. This is definitely a high-recommend and a must-buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sloarc

customer_reviews.title: Camera STOPPED Working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the camera because it seemed to have good reviews but I don't understand what people are talking about this camera stopped working within a few months. I purchased it to keep an eye on the puppies but after a few months we are lucky if we can get the camera working. It takes over 1/2 or more to activate. Most times I just give up. I wanted a reliable camera just to keep an eye on them and now I have to purchase another camera because I cannot return this one. I DO NOT recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Sotis

customer_reviews.title: 3 Months and it died!
customer_reviews.text: That's about how long this camera lasted. I was happy with it until I tried to check-in on my dogs while away yesterday and it wouldn't connect. I checked it when I returned home and none of the lights on the camera were on. I tried unplugging it and then tried plugging it into another outlet and still nothing. It sits on my mantle and I am the only person who lives in the house so I know it hasn't been moved. It just stopped working. $40 for about 3 months of use. I'm not happy at all and would never order one of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to set up if you are tech savvy it ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes a loud clicking noise on and off, sometimes every few minutes. Fairly easy to set up if you are tech savvy it could be difficult for the laymen. One star is for the quality of the camera over all. Once in use it would fail every few days and need a reset, but until you can reset it's useless. Sometimes just doesn't work. Customer service was no help either. Also, will not work of 5ghz network.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I gave a five star review so quickly.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Worked great for a little over 45 days. Now won’t connect. Return date ended 1/30/20. I’ll contact manufacturer for warranty, but really disappointed. So far, just perfect. Set up in about five minutes and works/paired with my iPhone perfectly. Currently sitting on a table, but will wall mount for better coverage. Picture is clear and motion detection works as designed. Haven’t tried the night vision yet. The sound quality is good, but I’m getting a little channel noise. I need to work with it a bit before I’d say there is a problem. Overall, for the money, this is a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good but night vision doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Disclosure: I received a free sd memory card for writing an honest review. Great quality so far! **update 10-31-17** night vision does not work which is super disappointing because otherwise it’s a good product. I wish there were options as to viewing the sd card material on your phone instead of having to remove the card and using laptop- but maybe there’s away and I haven’t discovered it yet. In the picture there are no interior or exterior lights on and no matter where I move it to face it’s dark with spots like this.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelauraxo

customer_reviews.title: know the ease/difficulty--including the location on Earth-- of obtaining technical service support from anything you purchase...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived yesterday from Amazon. I followed directions precisely. ALL necessary info & criteria of my cell phone, router, identification were met. Yet the camera WILL NOT CONNECT!!!!!!!!!!!! I have tried it again over and over...no use (also the manual and its ' illustrations' are not even the same as the iMegaCam app). The device sucks,period. I had planned to call for technical support today, however, I can not afford to call to China as there is NOT ONE US PHONE NUMBER AVAILABLE---GOOD TRICK. Essentially, I only gave it one star because there is no opportunity to give a ZERO!
customer_reviews.author: Doc  Rock

customer_reviews.title: Erratic Behavior and Dead for No Reason
customer_reviews.text: I love these miniature robot, when they work; however, they go "offline" for absolutely no reason and are not dependable for security purposes. You constantly have to reboot them from your cell phone. Light coming through a window or dust gives false alarms. I left 3 perfectly good cameras in my home 200 miles away and felt like I had a secure setup; however, the minute I returned to my full-time residence, 2 of the 3 cameras are "offline" and will not come back up. I can not drive 200 miles to unplug and replug them. I will ind another brand because Tenvis has let me down. I couldn't be more frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Pitsy

customer_reviews.title: Love the preset angle function.
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great except for at night when there's inconsisting lighting it clicks every 5 seconds because it's switching from night mode to day mode. Very annoying. But if you turn all of the lights OFF near it or turn all of the lights ON near it then it stops. I wish there was a way to view via computer desktop as well but you can only do it through the app. I love how you can preset angles. And then just press the button and it automatically goes to that angle. Much faster than using your fingers to move the frame.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera to watch our kitties!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll say the only issue that some might have is getting the camera connected through the app initially, but once you figure it out there are no issues. Pro tip: set up the camera through the app with it sitting directly next to your WiFi modem. Once it connects and you’re all set, you can unplug and move it wherever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I’m connecting to other people’s cameras. (That’s scary)
customer_reviews.text: Update: after a month it lost color capability. What frustrated me so I unplugged it. About 6 months later I plug it back in and guess what... the camera I connect to is someone else’s!!!!!!! Now this to me is very scary. Who needs to be spied on. I will wait for the business to open (I assume the camera is in a store. There’s a rack of belts and shirts.anyways I will use the voice and tell the owner to unplug the camera because it’s easily breached without any attempt to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Works well when it actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is cheap and offers good features but was very unreliable. There were frequent difficulties connected which I initially diagnosed as being the fault of our Wifi. Eventually, the camera stopped connecting to Wifi altogether and then only worked with Ethernet. Camera continued not to work with Wifi even after purchasing a new router. Low quality but works fine with an Ethernet setup.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kobliska

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, great customer support!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera and installed it easy. The panning response and images quality are great. I did have an issue from the beginning receiving notifications on my cell phone, but after a few emails exchanges with customer support the issue was resolved. Customer support was quick and attentive when responding. The only notes I will like to clarify for customers is that this camera do not support tracking and neither support email notifications, it only push them to your phone. I am very satisfied with my purchase, mainly for the quick responses from customer support. They do not hide.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Great little wireless camera
customer_reviews.text: We needed to get a video feed through a wall, a concrete floor, and into an acoustically treated room in the basement, about 150 feet away. This camera works without issue. We can view what's going on via an Amazon Fire tablet, including audio, & pan & zoom. Quality of the picture isn't the best, but we didn't get it for that, & it's mounted 15 feet up, with it's primary objects about 80 feet away, so short of an expensive camera, picture won't be that great. Would buy one again if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately it appears its not compatible with my WiFi or ...
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately it appears its not compatible with my WiFi or cell phone. my cousin bought 3 of this item and loves it. but we couldn't get mine set up i have to send back . has to be 2.4GHz compatible
customer_reviews.author: Tarez S.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product line
customer_reviews.text: Had another Tenvis camera which I returned and the replacement works just fine. This unit works once when set up then will never reconnect. Delete and reinstall and works fine that moment. Close app and come back other camera working fine this one fails to connect again. I've done it 4 times. Will need to return and get a leFun brand which my wife has at her house. It works immediately every time. Update: June 2020---Foolishly did not return, but moved to different house where it functioned fairly normally for a while. Now disconnected and in trying to delete and reinstall, the reset is not occuring. 7 months of trouble! Suggest you avoid this brand.!
customer_reviews.author: KerryK

customer_reviews.title: Good budget option for wifi camera
customer_reviews.text: Set up this camera as a low budget option for recording video at our office overnight and being able to quickly check in if we get a burglar or fire alarm warning. Easy to set up with my smartphone and it connects to the app online. Can take a while for the picture to load, but the images are very clear once it does. Nighttime resolution is lower than daytime resolution, but that is to be expected. Set it to record in the evenings and it has recorded video no problem (though it does require a separate microSD card).
customer_reviews.author: tonberrybadlands

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: At first my camera worked perfectly, and then magically one day it would not turn on it. I went from plug to plug around my house and it worked at 2 random ones, but not the ones where I had it plugged in for days prior. Now not even those plugs will work. if I sit there and keep plugging and unplugging it for 20 min I may get lucky for it to turn on. Wish I could give 0 stars. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate W

customer_reviews.title: Stopped motion detection- No guidance
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased 3 of these cameras and absolutely loved them! After awhile the motion detection just stopped working- which is a HUGE part of why I purchased them. I went through the troubleshooting steps of trying to reset the cameras back to the original factory settings and reset didn’t work on 2 of the 3 cameras. I didn’t even attempt the third because now these 2 cameras are useless. No one has responded to me in regards to how to fix them or what I can do. Now I wasted $85.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: JUNK. WONT CONNECT. DOESNT WORK. ALL IT DOES IS CHIME AND YOU CANT TURN IT OFF AND HAS NO VOLUME. APP IS USELESS. I MIGHT RETURN I MIGHT RUN IT OVER WITH MY CAR CAUSE ITS COMPLETE JUNK. Update : I contacted someone who is a tech nerd and they got it working. Instructions are hard to understand. Took him about 45 mins to get it working and so far no issues. Cannot see outside in the dark through a window but indoors works fine. Feel safer being able to check in on my family and home.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely does NOT connect to my 2G WiFi. The app freezes at connecting and will not connect to the cameras. I tried over two hours. I even turned off 5G WiFi and it still will NOT connect. Bought two of these cuz I was told it was easy to setup, but it’s not.And return is NOT full fee and the. I bought SD cards for each which I can’t return. So besides aggravation I can’t return SD cards and am out money, time, and have no cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Ann Lawson

customer_reviews.title: frustrating
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through several of these cameras. 1 had a bad transformer, 1 had crappy video quality. Had them both exchanged quite easily. We have had the 2 exchanged cameras for 2 months, the video quality is pretty good when viewing live but they don't react even when you jump in front of it or clap. If you turn the sensitivity 1 notch higher it goes off constantly but there is nothing moving in the video. I would take a hard pass on this camera
customer_reviews.author: SaavyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far! Hubby is loving his early Christmas present!
customer_reviews.text: We JUST set this up and it was really easy on both my Android Phone & my hubby's iPhone. Still unsure about motion detection quality. I need my dog to move more. :-) So far it has only worked when my hubby walked passed it, and he's taller and closer than the dog, obviously. Will know after the sunsets how well the night vision works. All pictures and video quality have been GREAT so far! Two-way seems great too! Still trying to figure out if we can change the camera view remotely though.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Brown

customer_reviews.title: just received looks a little beat up t happens
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today a little scratched up but I will keep for now I will see how it works right now it doesn't seem like it's picking up a lot I wanted to be able to rotate all around but it doesn't seem like it's doing that so far so we'll see and I'll decide if I'm going to keep it or not
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for my fur babies
customer_reviews.text: Wow...my husband and I are blown away by this camera. We recently added a puppy to our family, being able to watch him with this camera has put us at ease. The picture quality and night vision are amazing, nice and clear HD. We are able to listen to him, as well as talk to him through the speaker. I love that this camera allows me to take pictures and videos, the app is use friendly and runs smoothly. All in all, one of the best purchases we've made. We recently just bought two more to set up throughout the house. Now I hope they make one for outdoors so we can put a couple outside. Thank you TENVIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I unplugged this
customer_reviews.text: Was an easy set up then stopped working. had to reset it a few times then it started moving on its own. unsure if it was somehow hacked. Plugged it back in over a week later then it moved again on its own and freaked me out. It's unplugged forever now, my wi-fi has a security sensor on it so I don't know what the problem is by its gone, bye-bye
customer_reviews.author: froggyfee

customer_reviews.title: irritated
customer_reviews.text: Inititally was able to setup and got working without any problems. After un-plugging for a few days when I went to set it up again, It would not allow me to configure again even after resetting to default. a woeful experience with multiple apps, this can't be recommended as having to reconfigure because it was offline to 2-3 days is a joke then you can't because It doesn't recognize it's unique ID, give me a break.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Britt

customer_reviews.title: These cameras stopped working and there  no technical support
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5. 2 went to my daughters. They were never able to connect Buyer beware!!! I got 3 connected. These stopped working after 2 months when I could not return them and could not get my money back. They worked awesome when they worked. Nothing changed with my internet either. I’ve tried to reconnect through the Ethernet cord as well. They have no live technical support. I power them on, they cycle through but I get no sound and then they turn off. All 3 cameras do the same thing. I’m so frustratedand mad because I spent so much money and now have no recourse. I’ll buy smarter from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not great. Don’t buy this if you want your camera pan and movement to work.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a terrible camera but I cannot get it to move. It rotates upon reset but will not pan using the app. Completely useless the last time I went out of town. The color changes from black and white to color without reason. I know I can talk into it and sound comes out but I could not hear anything coming in. It’s cheap so I guess getting a basic picture is ok if that’s all you need but I wouldn’t recommend. I bought this because of the motion capabilities and they don’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Molly D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product to keep track of a relative that lives with me, who has breathing problems, when I have to go out. I was surprised at the quality of the pictures that the camera produces, better than some expensive ones I've seen. I can also talk to this person if needed. I would recommend these camera to anyone who has a baby or an older relative or even a pet that needs that extra eye sometimes. Great product and later was thinking on buying more. Received when I was told it would be here.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Defective cord
customer_reviews.text: The cord that came with sometimes wouldn't work without wiggling it and then if it would get bumped it would go off again. Can't figure out how to order a new power supply and the cord has completely stopped working. Camera itself was ok but can't do anything with it now.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAlishaSmith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am using this camera since more than 2 years , I am very satisfied with this product. I Highly recommend this, I use this camera in Child monitoring as it is having motion detection and it has Night Vision. Even when you are away from your home you can monitor via your phone , you will get notifications if there is any entry if you setup motion detection. Simply worth it. Amazing.. Amazing.. Amazing.. You have two way audio, you can talk to your family from any place where you are.
customer_reviews.author: Accord

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: ****Update Camera won't connect in my own home! Just from downstairs to upstairs. This has also been true when I'm at work and want to check the house. Also this company states if you leave a review you will recieve a 32gb sim card. I emailed with the review as instructed. 2 months later and no chip or response!! Just recieved and so far so good. Picture is with only a kitchen light on and the picture quality is good. Set up was a pain at first. Can not connect using 5G has to be with 2G
customer_reviews.author: enjcs88418

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if power cord stayed pluged in
customer_reviews.text: Power cord that plugs into base of camera is so loose it continues to loose power and drop signal. Item was received like this thinking it would be ok since it wasn't going to be moved after I placed it for my mother. I was wrong. App for the camera seems to drain phone battery quickly and I don't use my phone that much battery use to last 3 days or so now recharging almost every day phone just over a year old. trying to move the camera from phone app takes forever. Looking to send back asap wont go with this one again. Have owed just over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 of these, one in each kids bedroom and one in the living room. The best part is I can always check them on my phone from wherever I am which really helped when I went back to work after my maternity leave and missed my baby to pieces. I really like being able to easily zoom in and get great night vision so I can check on my little one sleeping without waking them by opening the door. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Crap
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks nice. Like most people say. It connects great. The first time. THEN NEVER AGAIN. I spent about 15 minutes to get everything up and going. Mounted etc. Then I spent the next 1.25 hours troubleshooting the dumb thing. Reboot. Reset. Re add. It works. Oh the unit restatrted randomly. It's working. It stopped. Repeat. Never buy this crap. I hate sending things back. But this is a must. Please save yourself the headache and never buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Died after 7 months...not recording anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this camera in April 2019, so it’s been less then 1 year. About 6 weeks ago the camera stopped recording. I had no idea, I attempted to pull the history up and there was nothing. I rebooted and set up from start to finish - nothing. I also replaced the memory card which was no where near full but still nothing. So it’s just sitting in my living room. It works for me to check in on the house but that’s it. No sound and no recording which really makes it worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was great. Then it stopped working within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It worked great at first but then it kept glitching out, would stop showing the view, and ended up not connecting to my internet anymore. I reset it and tried reconnecting so many times but was unable to. I emailed their support, but got an automated message saying they were on holiday and never heard any follow up. While it was working, it was pretty decent for a cheap camera. It was fast to set up
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Loses connection and takes multiple app restarts to get it to connect every single time. Then, every time it loses connection (which is always) it goes through a complete cycle where the camera scrolls through its complete range of motion and ends by pointing at the ceiling. This is both annoying to have to swipe through to change it to redirect each time, and creepy. Furthermore, there’s no on/off feature- you can only unplug- so if you don’t want it’s red ring of LED lights staring at you while you’re home, you’re SOL. Picture quality is decent, once you do manage to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this camera for the price and what I'm using ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera for the price and what I'm using it for. Only complaints I have is it switches to night vision during the day randomly and it can be quite annoying. The camera video can be a little slow to catch up but it is great quality for the price and the night vision and audio works well. The set up was a little frustrating because I had to change my WIFI password and I had to have my cell volume up so it could hear the R2D2 noise on crack. The power cord, is my major complaint because it is so short! All in all good camera if you'd like something inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Sulzman

customer_reviews.title: I’m going to give this 1 star
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is the second day I have had this product and the app keeps crashing I’m seriously over it and sending this sh!t back. When I tap on my screen to turn the camera in my house it keeps stalling...I guess I’m going to have to pay for security service with a company. But I’m definitely sending this back....The picture quality is great! You can watch live video and I love that. But I’m over the app crashing!
customer_reviews.author: THA BRAND BY A

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Ok picture. But there is too much lag time in audio and video display. I watched the video from a different room where I could actually see and hear my dog and the delay in what showed in the video from what she was actually doing was too far behind - about 30 secs to a full min. When I used the so called two-way audio, you could only hear garbled mess so my dog barked profusely at it. Retuning ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: Two way audio is CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: Ok with all honesty this one, pictures wise is good, night vision etc but the huge problem I have that’s why I don’t recommend this one is the two way audio. I can hear sound but they cannot hear me esp when I want to talk to my daughter. I rest it twice already maybe it will work but Nop still the same, I adjusted he volume and all and still crap audio!!!! I o my used it for 2 or 3 months I guess of course I cannot return because of the 30days window! I don’t recommend this one. Find something else
customer_reviews.author: Savvy J

customer_reviews.title: A few tweaks and they’d be perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cameras! I bought four, two for home and two my business. I had a bit of trouble at first trying to set up. I then realized I needed to be connected to my lower WiFi setting. Which Sucks because I’d rather have it connected to my faster internet. Once I figured out how to set up, the other 3 cameras were a breeze! Only other issues I have so far is needing text message alerts. I receive them through email but I’d like it through text. It has motion detection which is nice! You have to manually set the motion detector on and off. It would be convenient to have it set for certain times.
customer_reviews.author: VampLiz

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I use this one to check on my dog when I’m not home. The quality of the image is great, even in night vision mode. It was extremely simple to set up and use. The only complaint I would have is there is a short lag in the motion detection. I’d be hesitant to use it as a security cam because by the time someone passes in front of it, they are gone before you get the notification of movement. But if they are staying in the location of the camera, you can record video, take a picture, and have two way audio! Other than that, it is great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R Rodrigue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup, use, Remote viewing Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I like it very easy to setup, great size for a camera. I'm going to write instructions for remote viewing. On your phone, click on Settings, Other Settings. Find your camera IP number, it looks like this, 192.168.2.44. Copy this & paste as a URL in a computer browser, like Chrome. You'll get a page that asks for a name & PW. Input for a name 'admin' & the PW you gave your camera. Hit return & you'll get a page to setup the remote software. On a computer you need Flashplayer. Install camera software & restart your browser & you can remote view from the web anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: handy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to set up & works well.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good quality pictures & video. Nice mounting hardware. Various length power cord extensions are available in white and in black on Amazon for $5-$10.. Cons: Slow tilt & pan that uses finger swipes instead of pressing a direction button. The power cord is short and does not blend in well. Once the new power cord comes in I'll hide it behind the piece of corner trim.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This lasted less than 2 months and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for under 2 months and just like the other reviewers state it just stops working. It’s never been dropped or even moved from the dresser it sits on. It’s used for 1-2 hours a night and not every night. Total junk and of course the return window is only 30 days, how convient.
customer_reviews.author: WHM

customer_reviews.title: not enough pictures
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy twice, one I bought from thiryfea-US gave me an error saying camera ID was not valid and the app couldn't set it up at all so will have to return. My guess is it was a knockoff. But the other one I bought that was legit is good but the problem is with another brand I had before this (D-link) it would send 5 pictures to your email when triggered, this only sends 1-2 which is sometimes enough to get the open door but not enough to capture the face of the person who walks through it. It should be more adjustable with number of pictures or seconds in between.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Camera works great, excellent value, there are other options to avoid their unsecure P2P software.
customer_reviews.text: The camera works pretty well & has some nice features for the price point. I didn't want to use Tenvis' app due to the security concerns of their P2P network, but I was able to get it to work pretty well with some other software. Unfortunately, the other software doesn't support two-way audio because Tenvis doesn't use true ONVIF programming for this function, it's proprietary code. I tried to get the audio command CGI URL from their support team, but they were not very helpful. Still, I can live with the lack of two-way audio to avoid their P2P system.
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe

customer_reviews.title: My second Tenvis Camera
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little camera that I use for home security while on vacation. This is my second Tenvis..first one monitors the entire great room the second monitors the Master bedroom. Always dependable cameras with quality color video, super sound, motion detection, night vision and all around dependability. They are very easy to install to your home wifi system and come with detailed installation instructions. I am very happy with this camera and would recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Pascal J. Benvenuti

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Got my camera today and was excited to get it set up. The written instructions are a little tricky if you do like I do and just skim over them but, if you fully read them they are easy to follow and the camera is relatively easy to set up. The daytime and nighttime images are clear and the zoom works well. Controls are sensitive and accurate and the audio is is clear. Overall this is a great camera for the money. I plan on purchasing one or possibly two more.
customer_reviews.author: James Hively

customer_reviews.title: Good camera horrible app
customer_reviews.text: The Cameras setup went alright. The first was online in just a few moments. The second one I had to reset several times. The app they tell you to use kills what could be a great product. The app constantly crashes, there are NO instructions. The planning is very jerky no discernable way to properly pan in the direction you want the camera to go. The app tells you to go to the MFGs website for instructions. All you find there is the same instruction that came in the box. Unfortunately the app Is the only drawback to this little camera especially for it's price. I give it 5 stars of it had a better app.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: the price is low compared to the full run of features available. setup is weird and complicated upfront (use phone audio to program the wifi? not sure if its genius or crazy)- makes perfect sense after you get the first one running. have had one running for 6 months and able to see entire room- remote control works great night vision works exceptionally well at about 20 feet two way audio is acceptable - this thing isn't a ring doorbell but at this price you can buy 5 of them vs one ring (App is okay we have not tried zone alert function) considering buying a set for the house.
customer_reviews.author: possum5

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera for a very good price!
customer_reviews.text: Overall the camera is very good. It took a lot of time and effort to connect. After some trial and error, we finally got it to connect. The video is very clear. The camera rotates 360 degrees and the picture is in color and the night vision is clear too. The only thing we wished it had was a motion detector. The app runs very slow and it takes a long time for the picture/video to load. Also, the camera will not record without an SD card.
customer_reviews.author: LaVail

customer_reviews.title: It works fine once it finally connects
customer_reviews.text: It works fine once it finally connects. As others have reviewed, the feed connects to my iphone probably less than half of the time. There is nothing I do to fix the connection but click "connect" a few times until it does, so I know it's not from my end, it is just the product. Once it is connected, the picture quality serves its purpose (I just want to be sure the pup isn't getting in to trouble), but the picture quality good be better and the camera does lag a bit--I'm going try a different brand for the same price that looks to have more reliable connection.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 of these for my house, and planning on buying 8 more for another house. At first I was doubtful and proceeded to buy one and try it for 3 months, it worked perfectly and the app is surprisingly good. Here is my summary Pros: -Cheap price -Easy to set up after the first one -App is easy to use and very stable -The video and audio are decent enough. Cons: -Everytime it turns of(during an electricity outage) it goes back to an original position, therefore when installing it you must put it in the position it initially turns on to where you want it to look, and from there you can use the 360 moving feature.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban G.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Unit has extremely difficult to get working at times, constantly looses connection with wifi and router is in SAME room, support for the product is a joke, they do not even read you support requests fully, they seem to read first line or two then send a canned response which in my case, shows they dont as what email said to do I CLEARLY stated in email I had already performed that and more. For the very little time that is has worked seems to be nice camera.....
customer_reviews.author: Chris@Claire

customer_reviews.title: It’s great when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I use two of these cameras. One camera almost never works. It always needs to reconnect and takes forever to load. I think it’s been about 3 weeks since it’s even given me a view of the room. The other camera works fine. Great picture quality. I’m able to look around the room and zoom. UPDATE- Waste of money! These cameras never work anymore! AT ALL! Had them for 2 months and now they just don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Makes Clicking Noises Constantly
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this camera when I first got it, February 1st. But in the middle of March it started making these clicking noises. And when I checked the app on my phone to see if the camera was still working, the picture had gone black and white. Very weird. Because the next day the picture was restored to color. Now, it makes clicking noises a couple of times an hour. I’m not sure why it’s doing this but my paranoid mind goes to hacking. It’s cheap and it works but someone could be watching. Or whatever the real problem is.
customer_reviews.author: CallieCat

customer_reviews.title: New cams not compatible with iMegacam.
customer_reviews.text: I Have 8 of these cans now and I love them. Six of them I access through the iMegaCam app. 4 of those are at a mountain cabin 140 miles away and I view them every day. My only problem is with the last two I bought that will not work with iMegaCam. I am forced to use Tenvisty or another app to access them which will not work with my older cams. For some reason the manufacturer. Decided to go with a 20 digit cam address instead of the original 17 which makes them incompatible with iMegacam. I hope they fix this so I don't have to use two different apps.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after about a month
customer_reviews.text: we bought this camera so that we could keep an eye on our dogs when at work or away on vacation. The camera worked great at first but after about a month it stopped working. Could not get the camera to connect when trying to view through the app. I emailed support and never got a response back. I tried resetting the device and plugged it directly into the network instead of using WiFi and still could not get device to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: This camera has potential, and it might be our crappy wi-fi, but I hate how much it lags. I get the notifications for motion detection, but by the time I open the app and let the camera load, I don't see what it was that was moving. Also, I had to exchange it once before because the microphone on the first one I got stopped working. Then the second one stopped working after a day. It's a pretty useful and and convenient camera, if it would just work properly. Maybe I got unlucky and got 2 defective items. Will try to reorder again at some point. Amazon was really good about exchanging and letting me return though.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality in day and night
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these I use to watch my cat when we leave for a couple days. The picture quality is great and I can speak to her through the microphone and hear if she's making any noise as well. I wish I had purchased these years ago. *Update: I recently moved I cannot get the camera to connect to my new wifi. I've tried troubleshooting and followed the instructions accordingly. I still love the camera, but I won't purchase another one if I can't get this one to connect to my new wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Green Lights, Blue Skies

customer_reviews.title: Its good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Decent camera . Main complaint is anytime a storm starts to make the lights flicker the camera will reset to a "up view" position. You have to check it from time to time to make sure its in the position you need. And its constant record/motion record does cut parts out. As long as you aren't highly needing a few seconds of action (maybe a first punch/conversion)you needed for something. It is worth the money, We use ours to check in on our dogs when we are gone.
customer_reviews.author: BullDog413

customer_reviews.title: Camera is very good quality...app needs adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera to keep an eye on my dog when I'm gone but already see how this can be useful as a security camera. The picture is very clear even when the lighting is off balance. I also love the 2-way speaking capability. The only issue I had was with the app...they need to change the font color for the directional symbols; the font is blue on nearly the same blue background. It is extremely difficult to see which initially made set-up nearly impossible...until I had my phone literally right in front of my eyes to see the symbols. Other than that...so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MOBinDG

customer_reviews.title: So far its ok
customer_reviews.text: Initially the camera worked for a few days. Now the app had problem connecting to it, even if i am just few feet away and it is literally next to my router. Will try to troubleshoot it later. Picture quality is ok, the problem is with the motion detection, it is too slow and by the time it starts to capture, it is a bit late. But I guess it is like this with other wireless camera? Night vision is good, not exceptionally good. If it is not working right, I might have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tong

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is nonexistent. BUY THE WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Tenvis camera. I'm not sure why I actually bought a second instead of just buying a whole other system.. maybe because I'm too lazy to set up a whole new system. My first camera only rotates left/right anymore (purchased around Christmas of 2018) & not up/down. I emailed customer support & never heard anything from anyone. Customer service is nonexistent. The new one that I just recieved today (July 2019) is fully functioning.. for now. I bought a warranty with this one, so hopefully it was a one time deal for my other camera.
customer_reviews.author: YeaItsMe

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you know of other software
customer_reviews.text: The software is terrible, the camera is phenomenal, due to NO RESPONSE, from the supplier this product is completely useless. Should be removed from Amazon. Written them about the software and still nothing, PLEASE REFUND AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Art Thib

product_meta.title: TENVIS Security Camera- Wireless Camera, IP Camera with Night Vision/ Two-way Audio, 2.4Ghz Wifi Indoor Home Dome Camera for Pet Baby, Remote Surveillance Monitor with MicroSD Slot, Android, iOS App
feature_bullets: 【FULL COVERAGE WITH 720P HIGH DEFINITION. ①TENVIS HD IP Camera is designed with 355°horizontal and 120°vertical rotation to make up a 360°complete coverage. ②1280*720 Mega Pixels and high-tech optic lens present sharper images. So just enjoy fluent and the clearest video! ③In addition, you can add as many cameras as you want on your APP to monitor several locations, due to our onvif service.

【AUTOMATIC NIGHT VISION WITH 32FT/10M LARGE RANGE. ①TENVIS Night Vision Camera supports a night vision range up to 32 feet/10 meters, which could act as a deterrent against theft, burglaries, and vandalism. ②With the breakout of core technology "Smart Eyes" , this home security camera provides a stunning clear vision through 11 infrared LED light without disturbing your baby or pet!

【INSTANT ALARM AND TWO-WAY AUDIO FOR REAL TIME COMMUNICATING. ①With the help of smart camera, every potential danger will be identified accurately and sent to your phone and email immediately. ②Then you can talk to your baby/pet/nanny immediately when you receive the notification. ③Our noise elimination of the built-in microphone could provide a responsive and advanced talking experience.

【3-SECOND SENSITIVE MOTION DETECTION RESPONSE. ①This motion detection camera could record a 15-second video when it is triggered, and let you receive the alarm in less than 3 seconds. So you can always catch the important moments no matter it is your baby or a theft. ②Further, you can even set up to 8 specific positions for TENVIS dome camera to memory and then visit any of them by one touch.

【SMART AND STABLE ONE-CLICK CONNECTION TO WI-FI. ①With our technology of “Sound Wave Smart Connection” you can finish the Wi-Fi configuration in just one click! ②Our latest app provides a instruction video, so you won’t be confused about the process. ③Besides, you can also start and stop recording videos through your cell phone anytime anywhere. ◎Please note: This home security system supports 802. 11b/g/n 2. 4Ghz Wi-Fi band (does not support 5Ghz Wi-Fi).

【PROTECTS YOUR PRIVACY WITH LOCAL STORAGE. ①The latest TENVIS camera technology & top-quality standard mark this Pan/Tilt/Zoom IP camera as an ideal and distinctive solution for many different occasions. ②You can save the footage into your SD card or cell phone and never be concerned about privacy leaks. ◎Please note: SD card is not included in the package.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars6,564 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
